headline.main: Chinese Attack Two Anhwei Cities; Charge New Japanese Use of Gas

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, May 31 -- Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek's armies in Central China have launched a large-scale attack against the Japanese in Anhwei Province, about 200 miles west of Shanghai, the Chinese High Command announced today, and, aided by strong guerrilla forces, already are hammering at the gates of two of the province's largest cities.
